name: Soundless Piano
description:
To all those conceited pianists who think they're better than everyone just because they can use their metacarpals to manipulate black and white rectangles to create vibrations in air which are pleasant to our hearing organs, try and play these basic songs without sound.

That is if you know the keys.

Also for those dorks who aspire to be musical sensations but know deep down that dream will remain a dream. So wake up.
